channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Explore With The Miracle Hunter
channel.desc: "Miracle Hunter" Michael O'Neill investigates a stunning Marian apparition in Belgium. 11 year old Mariette Beco witnessed 8 visions of the "Virgin of the Poor" who promised to intercede for the poor, sick and suffering. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Serra: Ever Forward, Never Back
channel.desc: Despite casualties and a seemingly failed expedition attempt that would send them back to Mexico, a relief ship arrives on March 19th, the feast of St. Joseph. Serra goes on to establish nine missions in California before his death at Carmel in 1784. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Franciscan First Friday Holy Hour
channel.desc: Beautiful hymns and a Consecration to the Sacred Heart of Jesus make this Franciscan First Friday Holy Hour a wonderful opportunity to grow in your own personal devotion to our Lord. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Rosary With Mother Angelica
channel.desc: Mother Angelica and the Poor Clares of Perpetual Adoration recite the Sorrowful Mysteries of the Rosary from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Divine Mercy
channel.desc: From the chapel of the National Shrine of the Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Live Adoration From Ewtn Chapel
channel.desc: From Our Lady of the Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Scripture And Tradition With Fr. Mitch Pacwa
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch breaks down the oracle of salvation the Lord sent to soothe the souls of the people of Israel and explains the dire situation they were in due to their rebellious nature. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Where God Weeps
channel.desc: Mark Riedemann interviews H.E Yousaf Sohan, Bishop of the Multan diocese in Pakistan to learn about the 2023 blasphemy accusations and violent mob attacks in Jaranwala, Pakistan. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: World Over
channel.desc: Each week, Raymond Arroyo challenges viewers with important political and cultural reporting and analysis of a wide variety of topics of interest to Catholics and people of faith. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Rosary In French
channel.desc: The Agony, Scourging, Crowning with Thorns, Carrying the Cross and Crucifixion help us to accept pain and perseverance to the very end. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Finding God In All Things: The Teaching Of Ignatius Loyola On Daily Prayer
channel.desc: Fr. Timothy M. Gallagher, OMV discusses that when we find time for prayer we can fulfill our duties more richly, with greater love. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Our Father's Plan
channel.desc: Hosts Dr. Scott Hahn and Jeff Cavins take viewers on a fascinating journey through the Gospels to elucidate the important passages about the fulfillment of the Messianic prophecy. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Fields And Faith
channel.desc: Bob Dolan welcomes San Diego Padres pitcher Joe Wieland as he shares in-depth his great love for the Eucharist and how his Catholic faith helps him through difficulties. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: World Over
channel.desc: Each week, Raymond Arroyo challenges viewers with important political and cultural reporting and analysis of a wide variety of topics of interest to Catholics and people of faith. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn Pro Life Weekly
channel.desc: Every week, Abigail Galv?n and a team of pro-life experts shine the light of truth on abortion, euthanasia, assisted suicide, and the culture of death. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: My Lourdes Faith Journey
channel.desc: Brian Weber lost his only son in a car crash before getting deployed to Afghanistan. He shares how an encounter with Our Lady of Lourdes in the Grotto changed his life and brought light into the darkness of suffering. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! At Home With Jim And Joy
channel.desc: Jim and Joy continue their conversation with Cassie Everts, the co-author to ?Nursery of Heaven,? as they discuss how to support those who are grieving from losing a child. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reasons To Believe
channel.desc: Renowned Biblical scholar, Dr. Scott Hahn and co-host Mike Aquilina explore the meaning of the Apocalypse and end times in light of Catholic teaching. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: In this special edition of EWTN News Nightly, Capitol Hill Correspondent Erik Rosales profiles leaders on Capitol Hill and how their faith journeys affect their service to the nation. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Finding God In All Things: The Teaching Of Ignatius Loyola On Daily Prayer
channel.desc: Fr. Timothy M. Gallagher, OMV discusses that when we find time for prayer we can fulfill our duties more richly, with greater love. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: In Concert: Church Sonatas
channel.desc: Filmed at the Music and Beyond festival in Ottawa, Canada, famous pieces from Arcangelo Corelli and Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart are performed by the London Handel Players and the Chamber Players of Canada. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Dawn Of America
channel.desc: A docudrama looking at Christopher Columbus' discovery of the Americas. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: In this special edition of EWTN News Nightly, Capitol Hill Correspondent Erik Rosales profiles leaders on Capitol Hill and how their faith journeys affect their service to the nation. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Land Rosary
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch Pacwa leads the Joyful Mysteries of the Rosary from the actual holy sites and shrines where they took place, bringing the Gospels to life and offering a deeper understanding of the Rosary meditations. (19 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Blessed Virgin Mary
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word as they recite this beautiful prayer in honor of the Blessed Virgin Mary from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (11 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: St. Paul The Apostle Burning For Christ
channel.desc: An EWTN original documentary presents the life, missionary journeys and legacy of the apostle St. Paul, who was driven by a zealous love of Christ to proclaim the Gospel worldwide. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholicism On Campus: The Students
channel.desc: Missionaries at the U.S. Naval Academy talk over how we can live successful lives, while serving God with humility. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Father Spitzer?s Universe
channel.desc: Father Spitzer and Doug Keck discuss the appearance of the Blessed Virgin to St. Bernadette at Lourdes and the many miracles which are now associated with this apparition site. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Women Of Grace
channel.desc: Fr. Nathan Cromly discusses why the search for truth and wisdom is central to the spirituality of the Community of St. John. Hosted by Johnnette Williams, part 5 of 5. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Where God Weeps
channel.desc: Mark Riedemann interviews H.E Yousaf Sohan, Bishop of the Multan diocese in Pakistan to learn about the 2023 blasphemy accusations and violent mob attacks in Jaranwala, Pakistan. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Stones And Pearls: The Rosary In The Holy Land
channel.desc: In the fourth luminous mystery, the Transfiguration of Jesus takes place on Mount Tabor, a site where military battles were waged. The light of Christ is an eternal beacon pointing to God?s transcendent, radiant glory. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Chimes
channel.desc: Charles Dickens' story of a poor 19th century porter, who is magically transported to the future from the sounds of chiming bells and his hope is restored. Narrated by Derek Jacobi. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The First Saturdays For Kids
channel.desc: Sister Lucia teaches four children the importance of the First Saturday devotion, and the four steps necessary for fulfilling her request in this animated special. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Marian Procession From The Holy Land
channel.desc: A monthly Rosary Procession from the site of the Annunciation and Incarnation in Nazareth. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Kateri
channel.desc: Born a Mohawk, Kateri endured many hardships. Orphaned and ostracized by smallpox and traumatized by war, she embraced the Catholic faith, became a missionary to her people and our first Native American saint. (90 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Fields And Faith
channel.desc: Bob Dolan welcomes San Diego Padres pitcher Joe Wieland as he shares in-depth his great love for the Eucharist and how his Catholic faith helps him through difficulties. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! First Saturday Devotion
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word lead the devotion of reparation to the Immaculate Heart of Mary. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Divine Mercy
channel.desc: From the chapel of the National Shrine of the Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Live Adoration From Ewtn Chapel
channel.desc: From Our Lady of the Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Real Life Catholic
channel.desc: In South Texas, Chris Stefanick helps modern day Catholic cowboys and farmers with everything from rounding up cattle via helicopter to planting watermelon before taking part in an epic barbecue. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: At Home With Jim And Joy
channel.desc: Cassie Everts speaks about the newest addition of ?Nursery of Heaven? and addresses the best ways to bring comfort, meaning, and healing to those grieving from the loss of a child. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholics Come Home
channel.desc: As a former lapsed Catholic, Maria Hirsch shares her rediscovery of her Catholic Faith that lead her back to her Catholic roots began while serving as Director of a ballet school. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: In Search Of America's Catholic Founders
channel.desc: Archbishop Salvatore Cordileone and others explore St. Junipero's legacy in the light of today's cancel culture. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Rosary In French
channel.desc: The Joyful Mysteries of the Annunciation, Visitation, Nativity, Presentation and Finding and its graces and virtues. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Le Chapelet De La Divine Misericorde
channel.desc: The Chaplet of the Divine Mercy is prayed in French by the parish of Our Lady of the Nativity in La Garde, France. Our Lord taught Sister Faustina in Poland, the five decades to recite. Spoken and sung with portrayals of Jesus' Passion and Resurrection. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reflections With Fr. Leo Clifford
channel.desc: Father Leo Clifford reflects on the Epistle to the Ephesians, the awesome love of God for us, and we grieve Him by our sins. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: La Passion De Sainte Jeanne D?arc
channel.desc: A documentary on the Maid of Orleans released on the centennial of her canonization. St. Joan of Arc carried out her heroic mission with absolute confidence in God?s will, giving up her own life at only 19 years of age. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholics Come Home
channel.desc: Paul Darrow shares his journey home to the Church after an abusive upbringing in an atheist home and a self-destructive life as a homosexual successful international fashion model. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: Mother uses Scripture to discuss the importance and effects of prayer. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Watchmen Of The Night
channel.desc: A look into the life of Benedictine monks of the French Abbey of Sainte-Madeleine du Barroux. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Where God Weeps
channel.desc: Jonas Soto talks with Fr. Joseph Fidelis, director of the Human Resource and Skill Acquisition Center in Maiduguri, Nigeria about how the Church helps those effected by terrorism. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! The Choices We Face
channel.desc: From the 2024 Lift Jesus Higher Rally, Fr. Alex Colautti speaks about the ways God is always at work, especially in our times of greatest trial and suffering. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholic Classics: Mother Angelica Presents
channel.desc: Mother discusses the Beatitudes as decisions each of us must make during our lives. She makes a claim that the only investment that each of us must make during our life is in the Kingdom of God. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Speaking Of Saints
channel.desc: We were made to live with God forever but we must choose to do so. Susan Conroy explains that our everyday lives determine where we will spend eternity. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Living Right With Dr. Ray
channel.desc: Whether in business, family, or even politics, it?s important to set high standards and follow them. Dr. Ray explains how and why, along with two of his faithfully Catholic guests. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saints Vs. Scoundrels
channel.desc: To reveal the fatal flaws in Thomas Hobbes? philosophy, G.K. Chesterton pretends to convert to his materialistic way of thinking and beat him at his own game. Part 2 of 2. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Savoring Our Faith
channel.desc: Fr. Leo Patalinghug enters the kitchen to cook up some inspired dishes while explaining that God wants us to teach everyone as our neighbor, and to love each of them in the way He loves us. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Dominican Sisters Of Mary, Mother Of The Eucharist
channel.desc: There are many ways to willfully ignore the truth. Fr. Nick Monco examines how doing so can lead us into greater sin and unhappiness. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Land Rosary
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch Pacwa leads the Glorious Mysteries of the Rosary from the actual holy sites and shrines where they took place, bringing the Gospels to life and offering a deeper understanding of the Rosary meditations. (18 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of Saint Joseph
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word as they recite this inspirational litany asking for the prayers of Saint Joseph from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (12 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: My Lourdes Faith Journey
channel.desc: Tony and Sandi Bartolomeo remember their daughter Andrea, who received the gift of ?love without measure? at Lourdes in her battle with leukemia. Many souls have since traveled to Lourdes through ?Andrea?s Wish.?. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Life Is Worth Living
channel.desc: Archbishop Sheen emphasizes that the most intimate presence of God is in the Holy Eucharist. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholicism On Campus: The Students
channel.desc: From Mount St. Mary?s University, Msgr. Stuart Swetland fields the tough questions college students ask about the Faith, focusing here on the medical ethics. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saint Benedict Of Nursia
channel.desc: An EWTN docu-drama examines the spirituality of St. Benedict, founder of the monastic order the Benedictines, who left his wealth and the decadence of Rome behind to dedicate himself to a life of prayer. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Called To Communion With Dr. David Anders
channel.desc: Dr. Anders answers questions about the Holy Spirit, discerning a religious order or diocesan priesthood, and the significance of destroying the ring of a deceased pope. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reasons To Believe
channel.desc: Renowned Biblical scholar, Dr. Scott Hahn and co-host Mike Aquilina explore the ways we can witness to the Faith with our lives and defend it in the midst of attacks. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Truth In The Heart
channel.desc: Sister Thomas Aquinas explains how to identity the four marks of the True Church, founded by Christ Himself, in this engaging catechetical lesson for children (Grade Level 2). (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: My Catholic Family
channel.desc: The festivity of Our Lady of the Rosary is near and Sister Patricia tells Sara and Paula that for that day they are going on a pilgrimage to the Rosary Chapel to pray the rosary. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Great Books Every Catholic Should Know
channel.desc: Joseph Pearce provides insight into Cervantes' ?Don Quixote,? Milton's ?Paradise Lost? and Manzoni's ?The Betrothed? in this examination of literature?s holy fools and unholy falls that have graced Catholic civilization. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Adoration And Reparation
channel.desc: A special presentation of the Chaplet of Adoration and Reparation. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Angelus With Pope Leo Xiv
channel.desc: On the Solemnity of the Most Holy Trinity, Pope Leo XIV recites the Angelus in St Peter?s Square, invoking the Blessed Mother and uniting in prayer with many throughout the world. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn Bookmark
channel.desc: Dr. John Acquaviva shares how all those connected to athletics can draw on Catholic teachings to make any sport a more meaningful experience. He also discusses the body image war. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Spirit Of Catholic Leadership
channel.desc: Beware the 7 deadly sins in the workplace. The most insidious of all is pride, a form of self-idolatry. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Setting Captives Free: A Deeper Look At Ignatian Discernment Of Spirits
channel.desc: St. Ignatius of Loyola?s concept of discernment of spirits and Blaise Pascal?s ideas on diversion are the topics of this thoughtful examination by Fr. Timothy Gallagher. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Sunday Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate the Holy Sacrifice of the Mass each Sunday from Our Lady of the Angels Chapel as friars intone Gregorian chant. Visiting clergy concelebrate this sacrament. LIVE Sundays at 8 am Eastern. (80 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Sacred Heart Of Jesus
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word at the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama, as they pray the Litany of the Sacred Heart. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Praying As A Family
channel.desc: Families tell how eating meals together brought them closer each other and to the Eucharist, and helped form them as individuals. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Sunday Best With Fr. Groeschel
channel.desc: The magnificence of God is revealed through his vast creation of the stars and the galaxies. Today, Fr. Groeschel explains to our viewers how science and religion can not only coexist, but also inform one another. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Live With Passion With Father Cedric
channel.desc: Fr. Cedric explains how we can fulfil God?s Will generally and specifically for our own lives, by making the right choices and using the gifts God gives us in every circumstance. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Cross Training
channel.desc: Fr. James focuses on the dietary and spiritual aspects of taking care of our heart health. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Watchmen Of The Night
channel.desc: A look into the life of Benedictine monks of the French Abbey of Sainte-Madeleine du Barroux. (60 minutes).

channel.title: new! Holy Rosary From Lourdes
channel.desc: Pilgrims from around the world gather and pray the Rosary from the Lourdes grotto in France, site of the famous apparitions by the Blessed Virgin Mary in 1858. (30 minutes).

channel.title: new! Sunday Mass From Lourdes
channel.desc: (60 minutes).

channel.desc: The Chaplet of the Divine Mercy is prayed in French by the parish of Our Lady of the Nativity in La Garde, France. Our Lord taught Sister Faustina in Poland, the five decades to recite. Spoken and sung with portrayals of Jesus' Passion and Resurrection. (15 minutes).

channel.desc: Father Leo Clifford develops the idea that our deepest yearnings are put there by God due to His great love for us. He wants us to learn to love Him as much as He love us, impossible though that may be. (15 minutes).

channel.desc: Father Spitzer and Doug Keck discuss the appearance of the Blessed Virgin to St. Bernadette at Lourdes and the many miracles which are now associated with this apparition site. (60 minutes).

channel.title: new! On Good Soil
channel.desc: Jason Craig takes an in depth look at the momentum behind many Catholics choice to give homesteading a try, and whether it?s an attempt to escape society or grow closer to God. (30 minutes).

channel.title: Great Books Every Catholic Should Know

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Vaticano
channel.desc: Celebrating the Jubilee of Priests, Bishops, and Seminarians in Rome. Deacon Gilbert Tika shares the story of his vocation. And we explore the enduring bond between the Popes and Castel Gandolfo. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Church And The Poor
channel.desc: Fr. Richard Ho Lung and Fr. William Forrey take you with them in their poverty emersion experience among the poor. When we confront the poverty of others we are also confronting the poverty within ourselves. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: An Ewtn Holy Land Experience
channel.desc: Fr. Joseph Mary Wolfe and Fr. Mark Mary Cristina explore the Holy Family's life before Jesus embarked on his mission. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: EWTN foundress Mother Angelica lends her valuable insight into the subject of conscience - why we have it, and what we do with it. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Into The Breach
channel.desc: This exploration of the ?man crisis? facing the Church looks at the need for brotherhood in the lives of men, and the keys to leadership in developing character and bringing out greatness in others. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: The magnificence of God is revealed through his vast creation of the stars and the galaxies. Today, Fr. Groeschel explains to our viewers how science and religion can not only coexist, but also inform one another. (30 minutes).

channel.title: new! Life On The Rock
channel.desc: Fr. James Dominic Brent sits down with Fr. Mark during the SEEK conference in Salt Lake City to discuss the merciful love of God our Father and ways to live in union with Christ. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Icons
channel.desc: As they hear the story of St. Bernadette, and the amazing apparitions of the Blessed Virgin Mary to the three children at Lourdes, the pilgrims learn about the transformative power of unwavering faith. (30 minutes).

channel.title: Catholicism On Campus: The Students
channel.desc: From Mount St. Mary?s University, Msgr. Stuart Swetland fields the tough questions college students ask about the Faith, focusing here on just war theory. (30 minutes).

channel.title: Ewtn Live
channel.desc: Nikolas Nikas and Bruce Green discuss the common questions people face when they or their loved ones experience life-threatening injuries, end-stage illnesses, or advanced old-age. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Bob And Penny Lord Present
channel.desc: Bob and Penny Lord explore the fascinating lives of St. Augustine of Hippo and his mother, St. Monica. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Wild Goose
channel.desc: Fr. Dave Pivonka, TOR, reveals how the Holy Spirit allows Catholics to understand and come to know Christ even better. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Marriage: For Better...forever!
channel.desc: Marriage Counsler Greg Popcak explains how to love your spouse in the Church even when you are out of synch spiritually. (30 minutes).

channel.title: Living Right With Dr. Ray
channel.desc: Whether in business, family, or even politics, it?s important to set high standards and follow them. Dr. Ray explains how and why, along with two of his faithfully Catholic guests. (60 minutes).

channel.desc: Dr. Scott Hahn and Mike Aquilina show why the Mass is the Church?s most effective teaching tool. (30 minutes).

channel.title: Chaplet Of Divine Mercy
channel.desc: From the chapel of the National Shrine of the Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reflections With Fr. Leo Clifford
channel.desc: The most appealing words Jesus ever spoke were "Come to Me all you who labor and are heavily burdened and I will find rest for your souls." Fr. Leo Clifford mentions that Christ offers us so much and we need to learn to listen to Him and accept His love. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Crossing The Goal
channel.desc: Danny Abramowicz and the Crossing the Goal team explore the meaning of suffering of how you can bear it up for the kingdom, as they continue their hard-hitting look at Catholic spirituality for men. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: On Good Soil
channel.desc: Jason Craig takes an in depth look at the momentum behind many Catholics choice to give homesteading a try, and whether it?s an attempt to escape society or grow closer to God. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: When Children Adore
channel.desc: Fr. Antoine explains why we adore God and how we respect him by kneeling just as his servants Abraham and Moses did. (30 minutes).
